about_the_game:
metrocity is a city building simulation game that has interesting and unique gameplay. in this game you will be the mayor who manages and builds your city from 0 to become a megapolis city with a population of millions of people. You can arrange members of your government to help you in managing your city. There are some basic game facilities included such as:

1. Utility System

like cities in general which require water, electricity, sewage and garbage collector, in this game you can build and upgrade these facilities to the highest level. you can build a mega water dam or a nuclear fusion power plant with the help of research from scientists in your city.

2. Security System

A comfortable city is a safe city, so city security needs to be provided. In Metrocity you can build a police station and fire station, all of which can be upgraded to the maximum level following the development of your city. You can provide a mega police department for the availability of large numbers of police with more advanced equipment and vehicles, also a central fire station which can provide a more varied choice of vehicles.

3. Education System

build a university in your city and form a group of scientist researchers to open many new things in your city. improve the quality of education in your city to attract lots of investment and build large companies in your city. Workers with high quality and skills will be able to attract investors to invest in your city. The higher quality of education, the more technological and futuristic equipment or vehicles that you can create.

4.  Economy System

Adopting a real economic system, this game also uses a taxation system and commodity exports as the main keys to generating financial income for your city. You can adjust the tax rate to make more money but in return reduce the rate of population growth in your city. You can set residential, industrial or office zones to maximize your city's economy.

Apart from the facilities above, there are still many facilities embedded in this game. Built using an optimized Unreal engine, it will produce high quality graphics. We also embedded DLSS and Raytracing features in this game to make the game more immersive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 20H1
  • Processor: Core i5 6600 or Ryzen 5 1500x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 21H2 or 11
  • Processor: Core i5 12600k or Ryzen 7 5700x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 or Radeon RX 6600XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
